attributes.action: Install a system of variable speed limits measured against vehicle traffic.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Modern technology can easily be used to measure the amount of traffic on any given stretch of road. Speed limit signs can be connected to this information and limits set accordingly. Lower limits when the traffic volume is high and higher limits when the traffic volume is less. Set to the maximum as allowed in the road traffic act as at present, except for motorways where the maximum should be raised to 90mph.
